description.narrative: To improve infrastructure and mitigate the negative environmental impact of floods in Cotonou Agglomeration and to increase Benin level of preparedness for future flooding.

condition.narrative: Finance Agreement :Article IV 4.01 (a) | Description :The Recipient has expanded the mandate of the Delegated Contract ExecutingAgencies in accordance with section I.B of Schedule 2 tothe Financing Agreement | Due Date :29-Aug-2014
Finance Agreement :Article IV 4.01 (b) | Description :The Recipient has adopted the revised PIM referred to in section D ofschedule 2 to the Financing Agreement | Due Date :29-Aug-2014

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.A.4 (A) | Description :The Recipient shall ensure that the memoranda of understanding areamended or executed, to ensure ownership among the Recipient's relevant ministries and municipalities and effective implementationof the Project. | Due Date :10-Jun-2015

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.B. 1(a) and (b) | Description :The Recipient shall execute and thereafter maintainthroughout the implementation of the project, the delegated contract management agreement. | Due Date :16-Nov-2015

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section I.D.1 | Description :The Recipient shall update the Project Implementation Manual (PIM) forthe original project and thereafter implement the Project in accordance with the said PIM. | Due Date :30-Nov-2015

Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II B.4 | Description :The Recipient shall, and shall cause each of the Technical Operatorand the Service Operator, to hire the external auditor. | Due Date :29-Feb-2016
Finance Agreement :Schedule 2, Section II.B.4 | Description :The Recipient shall amend the contract of the External Auditor toinclude the AF. | Due Date :29-Feb-2016

Finance Agreement :Section 4.01(a) | Description :Each Delegated Contract Management Agreement has been executed and delivered bythe parties thereto and all conditions precedent toits effectiveness (other than the effectiveness of this Agreeme | Due Date:03-Oct-2011
Finance Agreement :Section 4.01(b) | Description :the Recipient has adopted the Project Implementation Manual | Due Date:03-Oct-2011
Finance Agreement :Section 4.01(c) | Description :the Recipient has established: (i) the Steering Committee; and (ii) the ProjectManagement Unit | Due Date :03-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Section 4.01(d) | Description :Each Memorandum of Understanding has been executed and delivered by the partiesthereto and all conditions precedent to its effectiveness (other than the effectiveness of this Agreement) have bee | Due Date:03-Oct-2011

Finance Agreement :Section I.A.3(c) of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall recruit for the PMU (x) an environment andsocial safeguards specialist and (y) a flood and disaster risk management specialist. | Due Date :29-Dec-2011
Finance Agreement :Section I.E.1 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall adopt and publicly disclose the ESMF and RPF. |Due Date :01-Mar-2012

Finance Agreement :Section II.B.4 of Schedule 2 | Description :The Recipient shall, and shall cause each of the Technical Operatorand the Service Operator, to appoint an external auditor | Due Date :01-Feb-2012
